312,138|293,148|290,148|252,174|214,207|229,229|233,229|253,230|313,230|333,231|393,231|413,232|433,252|453,252|473,232|493,233|553,233|573,234|653,234|673,235|733,235|753,236|813,236|833,237|893,237|913,238|973,238|993,239|1073,239|1093,240|1153,240|1173,241|1233,241|1253,242|1313,242|1333,243|1393,243|1413,244|1473,244|1493,245|1573,245|1593,246|1653,246|1673,247|1733,247|1753,248|1813,248|1833,249|1893,249|1913,250|1963,250|1969,234|1970,194|1682,170|1465,165|1433,165|1413,164|1373,164|1353,163|1293,163|1273,162|1233,162|1213,161|1153,161|1133,160|1093,160|1073,159|1062,148|1046,147|1045,147|1033,159|1013,159|993,158|953,158|933,157|873,157|853,156|793,156|773,155|733,155|729,155|641,157|553,152|513,152|493,151|453,151|433,150|373,150|353,149|333,149|314,139|312,138 275-01|Letters|,|Orders|and|Instructions|.|October|1755|.|275|.

773,2998|753,3018|733,3017|713,3037|693,3036|673,3016|653,3015|633,3015|613,3014|593,3014|573,3013|553,3013|533,3012|513,3012|493,3011|473,3011|453,3010|433,3010|413,3009|393,3009|373,3008|353,3008|333,3007|313,3007|293,3006|273,3006|259,3005|259,3041|242,3056|242,3087|261,3096|261,3097|273,3085|293,3086|313,3086|333,3087|353,3088|373,3088|393,3089|413,3089|433,3090|453,3091|473,3091|493,3092|513,3093|533,3093|553,3094|573,3094|593,3095|613,3096|633,3096|653,3097|673,3097|693,3098|713,3099|733,3099|753,3100|773,3101|793,3101|813,3082|833,3082|853,3103|873,3104|893,3104|913,3105|933,3125|953,3126|973,3107|993,3107|1013,3108|1033,3108|1053,3109|1073,3110|1093,3110|1113,3111|1133,3112|1153,3112|1173,3093|1193,3093|1213,3114|1233,3115|1253,3115|1273,3116|1293,3116|1313,3097|1333,3098|1353,3118|1373,3119|1393,3100|1413,3100|1433,3101|1453,3121|1473,3122|1493,3123|1513,3123|1533,3124|1553,3124|1573,3125|1593,3106|1613,3126|1633,3127|1653,3127|1673,3128|1693,3129|1713,3129|1733,3130|1753,3131|1773,3131|1793,3132|1813,3132|1833,3133|1853,3134|1873,3134|1893,3135|1913,3135|1933,3136|1953,3137|1956,3137|1965,3066|1964,3049|1953,3049|1933,3048|1913,3048|1893,3047|1873,3047|1853,3046|1833,3046|1813,3045|1793,3045|1773,3044|1753,3044|1733,3043|1713,3023|1693,3022|1673,3042|1653,3041|1633,3041|1613,3040|1593,3040|1573,3019|1553,3019|1533,3038|1513,3038|1493,3037|1473,3036|1453,3036|1433,3035|1413,3035|1393,3034|1373,3034|1353,3033|1333,3033|1313,3032|1293,3032|1273,3031|1253,3031|1233,3030|1213,3030|1193,3029|1173,3029|1153,3028|1133,3028|1113,3027|1093,3027|1073,3026|1053,3026|1033,3025|1013,3025|993,3024|973,3024|953,3023|933,3023|913,3022|893,3022|873,3021|853,3021|833,3020|813,3019|793,3019|773,2998 275-32|from|time|to|time|.|You|are|to|see|that|Coopers|are
